thread.title: Mrs Alison Barff-Lewis
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Mrs Alison Barff-Lewis

author: Mrs Alison Barff-Lewis
title: Mrs Alison Barff-Lewis
text: Had to make 2 returns to this company due to sizes and the first one I had binned the return form and bag but they e mailed me a new form and no delivery charge on returns and they replied very promptly to my emails. Delivered next working day.
